refnamediv.refpurpose: KLIPS statistic on number of successful ACQUIREs

refsect1.title: OBSOLETE
refsect1.para: Note that trap_sendcount is only supported on the classic KLIPS stack. It is not supported on any other stack and will be completely removed in future versions. A replacement command still needs to be designed

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: /proc/net/ipsec/stats/trap_sendcount is a read-only file. It contains a hexadecimal number which records the number of successful PF_ACQUIRE messages that were sent.

refsect1.title: HISTORY
refsect1.para: Written for the Linux FreeS/WAN project <http://www.freeswan.org/> by Michael C. Richardson <mcr@freeswan.org>
